Since approximately 08:26 UTC on 20 Jan 2021, customers may have experienced a disruption on the SAP Cloud Platform. Engineers are working to restore service and updates will be provided as events warrant.

Regions:
- US East (Sterling) [neo-us3]

Impact:
- Virtual Machines cannot be accessed via SSH 
- Virtual Machines may be inaccessible
